009package More_;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
012
013import java.awt.BasicStroke;
014import java.awt.Color;
015import java.util.List;
016
017import ij.IJ;
018import ij.ImagePlus;
019import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
020import ij.gui.Overlay;
021import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
022import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
023import imagingbook.common.corners.Corner;
024import imagingbook.common.corners.GradientCornerDetector.Parameters;
025import imagingbook.common.corners.HarrisCornerDetector;
026import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
027import imagingbook.common.geometry.delaunay.DelaunayTriangulation;
028import imagingbook.common.geometry.delaunay.Triangle;
029import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
030import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
031import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
032import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
033import imagingbook.sampleimages.MserSampleImage;
034
035
036/**
037 * This ImageJ plugin runs the Harris corner detector on the active image,
038 * applies Delaunay triangulation to the N strongest corners and displays the
039 * result as a vector overlay on top of the same image. If no image is currently
040 * open, the user is asked to load a predefined sample image.
041 * 
042 * @author WB
043 * @version 2022/06/25
044 * 
045 * @see HarrisCornerDetector
046 * @see DelaunayTriangulation
047 */
048public class Delaunay_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
049        
050        private static ImageResource SampleImage = MserSampleImage.MortarSmall;
051        
052        private static int CornerCount = 0;                                     // number of corners to show (0 = show all)
053        private static boolean ShuffleCorners = true;   
054        private static Color DelaunayColor = Color.green;       // color for graph edges
055        private static Color PointColor = Color.red;            // color for point markers
056        private static double StrokeWidth = 0.25;
057        private static double PointRadius = 1.0;
058        
059        private static Parameters params = new Parameters();
060        
061        private ImagePlus im = null;
062        
063        /**
064         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
065         * is currently open.
066         */
067        public Delaunay_Demo() {
068                if (noCurrentImage()) {
069                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(SampleImage);
070                }
071        }
072        
073    @Override
074        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
075        this.im = im;
076        return DOES_ALL;
077    }
078    
079    @Override
080        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
081        
082                if (!showDialog()) {
083                        return;
084                }
085                
086                HarrisCornerDetector cd = new HarrisCornerDetector(ip, params);
087                List<Corner> corners = cd.getCorners();
088
089                DelaunayTriangulation dt = DelaunayTriangulation.from(corners, ShuffleCorners);
090                im.setOverlay(makeOverlay(dt));
091    }
092    
093        // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
094        
095        private Overlay makeOverlay(DelaunayTriangulation dt) {
096                List<Triangle> triangles = dt.getTriangles();
097                List<Pnt2d> allPoints = dt.getPoints();
098
099                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter();
100
101                // draw the triangles:
102                ColoredStroke triangleStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, DelaunayColor);
103                triangleStroke.setEndCap(BasicStroke.CAP_ROUND);
104                triangleStroke.setLineJoin(BasicStroke.JOIN_ROUND);
105                
106                ola.setStroke(triangleStroke);
107                for (Triangle trgl : triangles) {
108                         ola.addShape(trgl.getShape());
109                }
110                
111                // draw the vertices of the triangulation:
112                ColoredStroke pointStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, PointColor);
113                ola.setStroke(pointStroke);
114                for (Pnt2d p : allPoints) {
115                        // get original Pnt2d shape (not Corner shape)
116                        ola.addShape(Pnt2d.from(p).getShape(PointRadius));
117                }
118
119                return ola.getOverlay();
120        }
121        
122        // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
123        
124        private boolean showDialog() {
125                GenericDialog dlg = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
126                dlg.addNumericField("Corner score threshold", params.scoreThreshold, 0);
127                dlg.addNumericField("Border width", params.border, 0);
128                dlg.addCheckbox("Clean up corners", params.doCleanUp);
129                dlg.addNumericField("Corners to show (0 = show all)", CornerCount, 0);
130                dlg.addCheckbox("Shuffle corners", ShuffleCorners);
131                
132                dlg.showDialog();
133                if(dlg.wasCanceled())
134                        return false;   
135                
136                params.scoreThreshold = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
137                params.border = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
138                params.doCleanUp = dlg.getNextBoolean();
139                CornerCount = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
140                ShuffleCorners = dlg.getNextBoolean();
141                
142                if(dlg.invalidNumber() || !params.validate()) {
143                        IJ.error("Input Error", "Invalid input");
144                        return false;
145                }       
146                return true;
147        }
148}
